      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static play.mvc.Result addProduct()
      Method takes the usernameSes from the session variable and sends it to the addProduct.html page; Where the Form for publishing the product needs to be filled in order to add the Product;
      static play.mvc.Result buyProductSuccess(int product_id, java.lang.String token)
      When a product is bought, the items attribute boolean isSold is set to true; and the buyerUser is set to the user who is currently logged in, that is, set to the user who has clicked (later gone through the procedure of the PayPal process);
      static play.mvc.Result createProduct()
      From the filled form and input fields takes the necessary values; And creates the object Product using the constructor; Sends the information about the product created to the showProduct.html page; Method creates(saves) the product using the create method from the Product model;
      static play.mvc.Result deleteOnePicture(int id, java.lang.String imgPath) 
      static void deletePicture(int id)
      The method is used when deleting product; In order for this method to delete the picture of the product if a user is deleting the product itself;
      static play.mvc.Result deleteProduct(int id)
      Deletes the products found under the given id;
      static play.mvc.Result denyRefund(int id)
      Method denyRefund allows Administrator to deny refund asked by buyer and sets it refunding fields to false
      static play.mvc.Result editProduct(int id)
      Finds the product under the id number; And sends that product to the editProduct.html page on redering; Where we will have a new form that we will edit;
      static play.mvc.Result filterCondition(java.lang.String ids1, java.lang.String ids2) 
      static play.mvc.Result filteredSearch(java.lang.String ids1, java.lang.String ids2) 
      static play.mvc.Result leaveBCommentTransaction(int id)
      This method leaveCommentTransaction, checks which user is currently logged in, As if the buyer is logged in, the method takes the comment from the form and sets it as the comment of the buyer to the transaction of the product that he has bought.
      static play.mvc.Result leaveSCommentTransaction(int id)
      This method leaveCommentTransaction, checks which user is currently logged in, As if the seller is logged in, the method takes the comment from the form and sets it as the comment of the seller (x-owner) to the transaction of the products that he has sold.
      static play.mvc.Result pikStoreProducts(java.lang.String ids1, java.lang.String ids2) 
      static play.mvc.Result productPicture(int id) 
      static play.mvc.Result refundProduct(int id)
      Method refundProduct allows User to send product he purchased to the administration in order they can review it and refund the buyer
      static play.mvc.Result saveEditedProduct(int id)
      Saves the new values of the attributes that are entered and overwrites over the ones that were entered before;
      static play.mvc.Result saveFile(int id)
      Upload image for User profile, and show picture on user /profile.html.
      static play.mvc.Result saveNoFile(int id)
      If the user does not want to upload a picture.

        public static play.mvc.Result createProduct()

      • saveFile

        public static play.mvc.Result saveFile(int id)
        Upload image for User profile, and show picture on user /profile.html. If file is not image format jpg, jpeg or png redirect user on profile without uploading image. If file size is bigger then 2MB, redirect user on profile without uploading image.
        Returns:
